pr_title: Renaming Utilities to Accessors for consistency

timeline.message: Refactor: renaming AuditUtility to AuditAccessor, AuthorizationUtility to AuthorizationAccessor, and SettingsUtility to SettingsAccessor
Refactor: Renaming SettingsAccessor back to SettingsUtility because it does not talk to the database directly

timeline.bodyText: While we're at it, let's just call it RoleAccessor.
timeline.author: gkillough
